main event: A civilian aircraft almost collided with a round, white object the size of a basketball at an altitude of 70,000 feet.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5-6 minutes, The object appeared to be on a collision course with the aircraft, The aircraft altered its course to avoid the object, The object seemed to alter its course as well, Weather balloon station located nearby at Des Moines, Iowa.
witness description: civilian pilot of a Beechcraft Bonanza
